price: Allah yaciye iteka agira ati “Rwose, njye n’Intumwa zanjye tuzatsinda.” Mu by’ukuri Allah ni Umunyembaraga, Umunyacyubahiro bihebuje.
arabic: كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ لَأَغۡلِبَنَّ أَنَا۠ وَرُسُلِيٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَوِيٌّ عَزِيزٞ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: kataba al-lahu la-aghlibanna anā warusulī inna al-laha qawiyyun ʿazīzun
